inclusion.criterion: Bladder dysfunction as a result of spinal cord injury
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: History of recurrent UTIs (defined as 3 or more within the past year or 2 or more within the past 6 months)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Signs or symptoms of serious UTI that requires the use of systemic antibiotics
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of any urine-acidifying agent, bladder irrigant, or systemic antibiotic within the previous 2 weeks
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participants colonized with gentamicin-resistant bacteria on baseline urine culture or a gentamicin allergy/sensitivity
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participants with known hearing loss and/or renal disease
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant at the time of enrollment or planning to become pregnant during the time course of the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent UTIs and bladder dysfunction due to spinal cord injury, but is currently stable and not using any urine-acidifying agents or systemic antibiotics.
